meanings.definition: The act of making something sweet.
meanings.sent1: The sweetening of the dessert made it irresistible.
meanings.sent2: I used honey as a sweetening for my tea.
meanings.sent3: The sweetening of the deal convinced him to agree.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the sweetening that brightened his day.
meanings.sent5: The sweetening of the air with the scent of flowers was delightful.

meanings.definition: Something that makes something else sweet.
meanings.sent1: The natural sweetening in fruits is healthier than processed sugars.
meanings.sent2: Stevia is a popular sweetening used in many products.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected sweetening in the sauce surprised everyone at the table.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the sweetening that lightened the mood.
meanings.sent5: The sweetening of the drink with a cherry on top was a nice touch.

meanings.definition: The process of adding sugar or another sweet substance to food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The sweetening of the lemonade made it refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The sweetening of the cake batter required precise measurements.
meanings.sent3: The sweetening of the coffee turned it into a decadent treat.
meanings.sent4: The sweetening of the tea with a spoonful of sugar enhanced its flavor.
meanings.sent5: The sweetening of the pancakes with maple syrup was a delicious choice.
